grain.title: Tahıl Stabilitesi
grain.formula: GHM = Δ · GM · tanφ; θ = 57.3 × GHM / (Δ × GM)
grain.source: SOLAS 1974, Bölüm VI; International Grain Code

gz-curve.title: GZ Eğrisi
gz-curve.formula: GZ(φ) = KN(φ) − KG · sinφ; küçük açılar için GZ ≈ GM · sinφ

free-surface.title: Free Surface Effect
free-surface.formula: FSM = ρ · L · B³ / 12; ΔKG = FSM / Δ
free-surface.source: IMO Intact Stability Code, Free Surface Appendix

wind-weather.title: Wind and Weather Stability
wind-weather.formula: M_wind = 0.5 · ρ_air · v² · A · h; tanφ = M_wind / (Δ · g · GM)

shear-bending.title: Shear Force & Bending Moment
shear-bending.formula: ΣW = 0, ΣM = 0 ve kesit boyunca kümülatif yük yaklaşımı
